content.title: My name is Ekaterina.
content.text:
I am a passionate front-end developer with over 4 years of experience under my belt. My love for micro animations and cutting-edge technologies fuels my enthusiasm for creating immersive and engaging digital experiences.

Throughout my career, I've taken great pleasure in working on media and interactive projects. Witnessing people actively using and enjoying the fruits of my labor brings me immense pride and satisfaction.

Right now, I live in Riga. I think this city is beautiful and peaceful, which helps me find a good balance between my work and my personal life.

Please take a look around my website to learn more about what I do. If you want to work together on a project, feel free to get in touch!
Iâ€™m interested in projects for media, projects with nice and clean UI/UX, and interactive projects.

experience.stack: React, Typescript, Less, Redux, JavaScript, PHP
Vue JS, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SVG, Canvas
